Name: Generate Particle Manifest
Description: Generates a particle manifest based on particles used

Name: Update Particle Manifest Version
Description: Updates the filename of an older particle manifest

Name: Update Soundscape Version
Description: Updates the filename of an older soundscape file

Name: Update Level Sounds Version
Description: Updates the filename of an older level sounds file

Name: Ignore Directory
Description: Skips this folder when looking for particle files
